titleStmt.title: The fathers legacy: or Counsels to his children In three parts. Containing the whole duty of man, I. To God. II. To himself. III. To man in all conditions. Vseful for families. Licensed. Roger L'Estrange. Aug. 13. 1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Brome at the Gun at the west-end of S. Pauls,

notesStmt.note: The words "I. To God. .. all conditions." are bracketed together on title page.
The first leaf bears royal arms on verso.
With four final contents leaves and a final advertisement leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
